meanings.definition: A literary work made up of quotations from other works.
meanings.sent1: The teacher assigned us to create a cento for our poetry project.
meanings.sent2: The cento was filled with lines borrowed from famous poets.
meanings.sent3: The cento of quotes made the audience chuckle at the clever compilation.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like a cento of wisdom, pieced together from various sources.
meanings.sent5: The cento of phrases painted a vivid picture of emotions and experiences.

meanings.definition: A patchwork quilt made from pieces of fabric.
meanings.sent1: Grandma spent hours sewing a beautiful cento for my bed.
meanings.sent2: The cento on the couch was a colorful mix of patterns and textures.
meanings.sent3: The cento kept me warm on chilly nights with its cozy embrace.
meanings.sent4: The cento of memories stitched together in my mind like a quilt.
meanings.sent5: The cento of fabric squares told a story of love and dedication.
